field.name: AlbumID1
field.label: AlbumID1
field.description: ID of album to show photos from. The album ID is located in the URL when viewing any of your albums, for instance in the url http://cedricwalter.smugmug.com/gallery/2504559_f3ta9#131481399, the album id is the set of numbers after /gallery/ and before the #-symbol followed by the ImageID - in this example the AlbumID is 2504559\n SEMI-REQUIRED You must either provide an AlbumID OR a feedURL as below or nothing works.\n

field.name: AlbumKey1
field.label: AlbumKey1
field.description:
Key of album to show photos from
 The album key is located in the URL when viewing any of your albums, for instance in the url http://cedricwalter.smugmug.com/gallery/2504559_f3ta9#131481399, the album key is the string of characters after /gallery/2504559_ and before the #-symbol followed by the ImageID - in this example the AlbumKey is f3ta9
 SEMI-REQUIRED You must either provide an AlbumID and AlbumKey OR a feedURL as below or nothing works.
